coreAtributes.authorTag: Inside the tongue of each boot "Made by the DSG Tannery Guild" is burned into the leather.
coreAtributes.name: leather boot
coreAtributes.description: A pair of soft leather boots with folded over gussets. Although heavily worn, they have been well cared for.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] the boots on and [npc.verb(adjust)] the laces until they're comfortable. [npc.She] then [npc.verb(tie)] them together into a sturdy knot.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet] into the boots and [npc.verb(adjust)] the laces until they're comfortable. [npc.She] then [npc.verb(tie)] them together into a strudy knot.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(stuff)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet] into the boots and [npc.verb(pull)] the laces as tightly as possible before tying a hasty knot.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the laces and pull the boots from [npc.her] [npc.feet].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the laces and pull the boots from [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet].
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(rip)] the lace open and yank the boots from [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet].
